column4: *anyone* i'm trying to compile E17 and its libs on my system (ubuntu breezy) but i get an error when compiling evas (a EFL library) because it needs Xorg compiled with XShm.h , what can i do about it? and do you any ubuntu dev to point him out the following question? why didn't you guys compile X with that header?
i want E17 from CVS , i used to use that howto (shadfoi's one) and those repos
